verses.text: \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w performed|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w completed|strong="H7999"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w items|strong="H3627"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w dedicated|strong="H6944"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w*—\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* treasuries \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1931"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.\f + \fr 5:3 \ft That is, the Feast of Tabernacles (or Booths or Shelters); see Leviticus 23:33–36.\f*

\w When|strong="H5375"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* arrived, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark,

\w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w with|strong="H3548"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacred|strong="H6944"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3605"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark, \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H3259"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w counted|strong="H5608"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w brought|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ark \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H8478"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inner|strong="H1687"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Most|strong="H6944"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Place|strong="H4725"\w*,\f + \fr 5:7 \ft Or the Holy of Holies\f* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w overshadowed|strong="H4605"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w and|strong="H4725"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* poles.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* poles \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ark \w extended|strong="H1961"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* enough \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w ends|strong="H7218"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w visible|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inner|strong="H1687"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H1687"\w*,\f + \fr 5:9 \ft Some Hebrew manuscripts and LXX The poles extended far enough that their ends were visible from the Holy Place in front of the inner sanctuary; see 1 Kings 8:8.\f* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Holy \w Place|strong="H1961"\w*;\f + \fr 5:9 \ft Literally not from outside\f* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* nothing \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ark \w except|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*,\f + \fr 5:10 \ft That is, Mount Sinai, or possibly a mountain in the range containing Mount Sinai\f* where \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6942"\w* regardless \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w*. \w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Place|strong="H6944"\w*,

\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*—Asaph, \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w relatives|strong="H1121"\w*—\w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w side|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w dressed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H3847"\w* fine linen \w and|strong="H3967"\w* playing \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w accompanied|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H5975"\w* 120 \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w sounding|strong="H2690"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w trumpeters|strong="H2689"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* joined \w together|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w one|strong="H2896"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w*, accompanied \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w musical|strong="H7892"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w loving|strong="H2896"\w* \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w endures|strong="H5769"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*
